text: The Brooklyn Gothams were an American basketball team based in Brooklyn, New York that was a member of the American Basketball League. Before the 1946/47 season the team was known as the New York Gothams. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. title: Brooklyn Gothams
